column2: Ulcerating tumor by right ear, slightly bigger than pea sized. Possible slight lethargy-- not too noticeable.
Brain, lungs, heart, liver, kidneys, spleen, tumor
Tumor was bloody an ulcerated on one part.
Large mass in back of thoracic cavity, pushed up against the spine.
Appeared to be somewhat fused with surrounding tissue and wasn't very attached to lungs.
Some other small lung nodules present as well.
